name: Penguiner
description:
Platform away as a cute little penguin with PENGUINER! Run, jump and slide , collecting coins, gems and much more along the way! But beware of the Sinister Snowmen, as they are out to get you!

The demo, containing the first 3 levels is out now! 

Note: This game has been made using free assets for my personal pleasure as an exercise in learning to make games! It is an itch.io exclusive so please let me know if you see it anywhere, for free or otherwise, as I won't have put it there!
